quote: At the touch of love, everyone becomes a poet.
author: Plato

quote: Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.
author: Osho

quote: Where there is love, there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
author: Rumi

quote: In your smile, I see something more beautiful than the stars.
author: Beth Revis

quote: Democracy is government of the people, by the people, for the people.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Democracy is the worst form of government — except for all the others that have been tried.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Democracy is the process by which people choose the man who'll get the blame.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Man is born free, and everywhere he is in chains.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: I think, therefore I am.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: The smart way to keep people passive and obedient is to strictly limit the spectrum of acceptable opinion.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: Nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution.
author: Theodosius Dobzhansky

quote: The greatest show on Earth is life itself.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: We are an improbable collection of atoms, organized to ponder our own existence.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: The absence of evidence is not the evidence of absence.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Education is not the learning of facts, but the training of the mind to think.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The distinction between past, present and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
author: Sthephen Hawking

quote: People who boast about their IQ are losers.
author: Sthephen Hawking

quote: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
author: Sthephen Hawking

quote: Where there's life, there's hope.
author: Sthephen Hawking

quote: You could never convince a monkey to give you a banana by promising him limitless bananas after death in monkey heaven.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: Humans think they are seeking truth, but really they are seeking comfort.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: If you can't explain something in simple terms, you don't understand it.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Religion is a culture of faith; science is a culture of doubt.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce.
author: Karl Marx

quote: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Really socialism comes from the heart, right? […] Capitalism comes from the head because there are always cheaters in any system.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: If you had gotten all the girls, if you had all the money, if you had everything you wanted, you were good looking in junior high or high school, you wouldn't have done anything with your Life. And you would have peaked early.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: I know no one can compete with me on it. Because I'm just playing 16 hours a day. And if they want to compete with me and they're going to work, they're going to lose.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: I'm always working, but it looks like work to them, but it feels like play to me.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: To gain knowledge and understand the universe. That's what I think. I can't see any higher purpose than that.
author: Demis Hassabis
